dcterms:creator: Marcos Zampieri
Shervin Malmasi
Preslav Nakov
Sara Rosenthal
Noura Farra
Ritesh Kumar
dcterms:description: The dataset used in OffensEval consists of 14100 posts categorized into three sub-tasks: Sub-task A for detecting offensive language, Sub-task B for categorizing the type of offense, and Sub-task C for identifying the targets of insults and threats.
dcterms:title: OffensEval

dcterms:creator: Thomas Davidson
Dana Warmsley
Michael Macy
Ingmar Weber
dcterms:description: The Hate Speech Detection dataset is used for identifying hate speech in social media posts, focusing on the challenges of automated hate speech detection.
dcterms:title: Hate Speech Detection dataset
